flavor: "Proszę zostawić to profesjonalistom. Jeśli jeszcze raz was złapię na wściubianiu nosa w nie swoje sprawy, skończy się to na komisariacie."
name: Alice Luxley
text:
Dostajesz +1 [intellect].
[reaction] Po tym, jak odkryjesz żeton wskazówki, wyczerp Alice Luxley: zadaj 1 obrażenie wrogowi w twojej lokalizacji.

name: W dobrym stanie
text:
Szybka. Zagraj tylko podczas twojej tury. 
Dołącz do atutu z cechą [[Przedmiot]], który kontrolujesz. Limit 1 na atut.
[reaction] Po tym, jak zostanie odrzucony atut, do którego dołączono tę kartę: cofnij go na ręke właściciela razem z każdym innym dołączonym do niego dodatkiem z cechą [[Ulepszenie]].

flavor: "Are you sure you want to know? There is no going back."
name: Mr. "Rook"
text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[free] Exhaust Mr. "Rook" and spend 1 secret: Search the top 3, 6, or 9 cards of your deck for any card and draw it. If at least 1 weakness is among the searched cards, draw 1 of them, as well. Shuffle your deck.

name: Hawk-Eye Folding Camera
text: [reaction] After the last clue is discovered from your location: Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on this card, as evidence. (Limit once per game at each location.) While Hawk-Eye Folding Camera has ... - ... 1 or more evidence, you get +1 [willpower]. - ... 2 or more evidence, you get +1 [intellect]. - ... 3 or more evidence, you get +1 sanity.

name: Henry Wan
text:
[action] Exhaust Henry Wan: One at a time, reveal random tokens from the chaos bag until you choose to stop, or until you reveal a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol.
- If you chose to stop, for each token revealed via this effect, you may either draw 1 card or gain 1 resource.
- If you revealed a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] symbol, do nothing.

name: Swift Reflexes
text:
Fast. Play during any investigator's turn, except during an action.
Immediately take an action as if it were your turn. This action does not count toward the number of actions you can take each turn.

name: Wither
text: [action]: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol is revealed during this attack, the attacked enemy gets -1 fight and -1 evade for the remainder of the turn (to a minimum of 1).

name: Sixth Sense
text: [action]: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] symbol is revealed during this test, you may choose a revealed location connected to your location; you are now investigating as if you were at the chosen location instead of your location (you may use either shroud value).

name: Drawing Thin
text: [reaction] When you initiate a skill test, exhaust Drawing Thin: Increase the difficulty of this skill test by 2. Gain 2 resources or draw 1 card.

name: Belly of the Beast
text:
Fast. Play after you successfully evade an enemy by 2 or more.
Discover 1 clue at that enemy's location.
